# Trailing Slash Normalization Test

URLs with and without trailing slashes should be normalized.

## Path Variations

The API documentation [1] is the same as [2].
Root paths [3] and [4] are different (root preserved).

[1]: https://example.com/api/
[2]: https://example.com/api
[3]: https://example.com/
[4]: https://example.com
